Patrick rejects lawmakers' transport plan

Disagreeing with the House and Senate who approved the bill, Patrick urged the Legislature to raise gas taxes at least three more cents in 2017 when lower tolls will leave a $135 million revenue hole. (2:31 p.m.)

Did Tebow once break up a Hernandez brawl?

Tim Tebow once tried to break up a "violent" bar fight between then-17-year-old freshman Aaron Hernandez and a bouncer at a Florida bar, according to a report. (1:31 p.m.)

Man claimed dead aunt for One Fund money

Branden Mattier, 22, was arrested for trying to defraud the charity out of $2.2 million by claiming his aunt, who died 10 years ago, was injured at the Marathon. (2:47 p.m.)

Boston ranks 6th when it comes to July 4, CardHub.com says

By its lights, Los Angeles tops the list as the ideal US city for saluting Independence Day, followed by Chicago and San Francisco, according to a survey from the comparison credit-card website.
